thread.title: Megan Marx and Tiffany Scanlon frolic in skimpy bikinis
thread.title_full: Megan Marx and Tiffany Scanlon frolic in skimpy bikinis | Daily Mail Online

author: Hannah Paine For Daily Mail Australia
title: Megan Marx and Tiffany Scanlon frolic in skimpy bikinis
text:
They made Bali their home together after declaring their love for each other.
And The Bachelor 's Megan Marx and Tiffany Scanlon are making the most of their new love nest, soaking up the tropical surrounds at a Balinese beach.
The loved up couple took to the waves on Monday, putting on a very amorous display as they packed on the PDA in the waves together.
Scroll down for video
Hot couple alert! The Bachelor's Megan Marx and Tiffany Scanlon canoodle and frolic in skimpy bikinis at a Bali Beach
The reality TV stars looked stunning as they headed down to the beach to cool off in the sea.
Keeping things casual, both women wore cotton tank dresses with their bikinis underneath.
The couple seemed keen to play tourist in their new home, with Megan snapping a picture of Tiffany sticking her tongue out in a silly pose.
Say cheese! The couple seemed keen to play the tourist in their new home, with Megan snapping a picture of Tiffany sticking her tongue out in a silly pose
Beach bodies: The boho babes looked stunning as they headed down to the beach to cool off in the sea
Cooling off: Obviously keen to try the water's temperature, the two lovebirds stripped out of their dresses and made their way down to the waves
Obviously keen to try the water's temperature, the two lovebirds stripped out of their dresses and made their way down to the waves.
Megan showed of her stunning curves in a hot pink bikini which flaunted her cleavage and pert derriere.
She matched the bright swimsuit with a pair of retro pink sunglasses which went perfectly with the beach get up.
Beach time! Tiffany looked equally attractive in a racy leopard print swimsuit, its skimpy design revealing her washboard stomach and trim pints
Flaunting her body: Megan showed of her stunning curves in a hot pink bikini which flaunted her cleavage and pert deriere
Once in the water, the couple were clearly feeling amorous, unable to keep their hands off one another
Tiffany looked equally attractive in a racy leopard print swimsuit, its skimpy design revealing her washboard stomach and trim pins.
The fitness fanatic wore her golden locks in a single plait.
Once in the water, the couple were clearly feeling amorous, unable to keep their hands off one another.
The look of love: The two former Bachelor contestants hugged and stared deep into each other's eyes
Joking around: Things soon turned playful as Megan and Tiffany play wrestled with each other on the beach
Horseplay: It appeared like they were trying to dunk each other under the water.
The two former Bachelor contestants hugged and stared deep into each other's eyes.
Things soon turned playful as Megan and Tiffany wrestled with each other on the beach, with it appearing like they were trying to dunk each other under the water.
Megan chased Tiffany through the waves, while Tiffany returned the favour with a cheeky splash to her lady love.
Catch me if you can! Megan chased Tiffany through the waves
Who is the strongest? The girls were clearly in a playful mood when they were down at the beach
High kick! Tiffany returned the favour with a cheeky splash to her lady love.
Making up? But it seemed that neither women were taking the fight too seriously, with smiles happily plastered on both Megan and Tiffany's faces
But it seemed that neither women were taking the fight too seriously, with smiles happily plastered on both Megan and Tiffany's faces.
Having their fill of the water, the two made their way out of the sea and back onto the beach.
Tiffany dried herself off with a towel, before both women pulled a cheeky disappearing act underneath it together.
Who won? The girls looked to be happily making up after a play flight in the waves
Had enough: Having their fill of the water, the two made their way out of sea and back onto the beach.
She works out! Tiffany has previously made no secrets of the lengths she goes to get her enviable figure
Perhaps wanting to escape any prying eyes on the beach, the loved up couple huddled together under their towels.
The two appeared close and looked to be sharing an intimate moment as they hid from view.
Megan and Tiffany officially moved in together last week, making their love nest in the seaside village of Canggu.
Time to leave? Tiffany dries off from the beach with a towel on the sand
Hiding something? Perhaps wanting to escape any prying eyes on the beach, the loved up couple huddled together under their towels
What's going on here? The two appeared close and looked to be sharing an intimate moment as they hid from view
